ArgonTest.Name: Trait instance method (param)
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
trait MyTrait public proc _.say_hello(msg: String): () = abstract end
instance MyInst: MyTrait public override proc _.say_hello(msg: String): () = puts msg end
proc main(): () do let o = MyInst
o.say_hello "Hello World" end
